features: ULTRA BUTTERFLY BUTTON PILLOW: THE SLEEP REVOLUTION IS HERE! Engineered with an innovative design featuring a unique hollow and butterfly-patented contour, Emircey neck pillows revolutionize your sleep by mimicking the human anatomy. This contour molds airtight to your head's shape, aligning your entire body spine naturally and reducing cervical stress to the maximum. And it also offers ample space for your shoulders without feeling cramped or constricted. It's your secret to pain-free mornings.

VERSATILE PILLOW FOR TAILORED PAIN RELIEF - Whether you like side, back, or stomach sleeping, our cervical neck pillow is your ally in achieving a pain-free sleep experience. Specially crafted with curves, divots, and angles, this orthopedic pillow offers complete support for your neck and shoulders, allowing you to shift positions comfortably. Enjoy the added armrests ensuring your hands don't wake up numb. Emircey Contour Pillow is your ultimate pursuit of luxury, pain relief, and sleep.

ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT BLISS - YOUR PILLOW, YOUR WAY! Every sleeper is unique, and our adjustable pillows cater to diverse needs by adding or removing inserts. The removable insert (0.8'') at the bottom provides more choices for higher or lower contours. And rotate it 180 degrees, you can get different heights (3.5'' & 3.1''). This guarantees you can maintain the 15-degree golden ratio for the perfect sleeping position. If you have a higher need, simply contact us for an extra insert(ONLY THE US).

EMBRACE YOUR HIGH-QUALITY & BREATHABLE COOLING PILLOW! Worried about hot sleep? Fear not! The 3D mesh pillowcases and open-cell memory foam facilitate optimal heat dissipation, offering you a cool and refreshing night's sleep. Crafted with high-quality CertiPUR-US & Oeko-Tex certified memory foam, it offers a unique slow-rebound feature that provides firm support. This innovative material retains its shape and firmness, ensuring a durable and consistent experience throughout the seasons.

HASSLE-FREE PURCHASE EXPERIENCE! It's time to buy Emircey contour pillows for embracing healthy sleep! If you have any inquiries about our neck pillows for pain relief sleeping, please feel free to contact our customer service. It's a good gift for dad, mom, fathers, mothers, girlfriends, boyfriends, husbands, wife & colleagues, birthdays Christmas gifts. Buy Emircey ergonomic pillow for neck pain! Experience the bliss of pain-free sleeping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and ergonomic
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow for my wife who has kneck pain from an accident. If she doesn't sleep on the right ergonomic pillow she can be in pain for days. She has been using this pillow for a week and reports that it's fantastic. It fits her head and kneck perfectly and gives just the right support. I was also pleasantly surprised that it had almost no odor when first opening it which most do.The pillow appears a little small at first, but it really is exactly the right size and shape to cradle your noggin and support your neck.What makes me happy is that we have been buying specialized ergonomic pillows that cost well over a hundred dollars and can now switch to this. A significant savings, even if we had to buy them more often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shaped funny, but is comfy
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is a decent buy. I originally bought it to alleviate some back pain. I do feel it helps me as a side sleeper. It has grooves in the side to place your arms. It has a lot of bounce to it. I sleep pretty hot, so I like that this pillow is cooling. I buy cooling bamboo sheets as well. The one drawback is that iys weird shape does make it look awkward inside a case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used this pillow for a few days now. It is good for support, but I find it to be a little firm and the sides are smaller than I thought. It has good structure and has improved my sleep quality. I got the standard size and it is a little smaller than my queen pillows. Overall, I needed a pillow with a little more support and this does well for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great support for head and neck
reviews.reviewText: Was a little skeptical about this product. It actually works great. Improved sleep & no shoulder pain. It alsohelps with snoring issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Innovative design with comfort
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is an innovative and comfortable pillow that offers excellent support for your head and neck. It features a unique designthat adapts to your head's shape, providing customized support throughout the night. This pillow is designed to relieve pressure on your neck and shoulders, reducing pain and discomfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more neck pain!
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is amazing. I had a different pillow for neck support, but lately I've been having really bad headaches that I know are largely because of neck and shoulder tension. I ordered this because of the amazing reviews and they were spot on. This pillow has the perfect cradling of my head so I'm not straining anything in my neck in some weird position. I also love the little "ledges" on the edge of the pillow to rest my hands on (I'm a side sleeper). This pillow has been a game-changer, I'm so glad I ordered it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Keeps it’s shape. Love how it cradles my head. Just the right amount of firmness. Unlike my old pillows, I am not fiddling around in the middle of the night trying to get the right comfort level with my pillows. I have been getting a much better night’s rest since I bought the pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really comfy and cool
reviews.reviewText: This pillow has really helped my neck and shoulder problems. I don’t wake up near as sore as I did before… it’s nice and firm, yet very conforming and full of cushion when you lay down on it. The best part is, it keeps me cool during the night. That’s a huge plus in my book!
